data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anker, Arthur, Komai, Tomoyuki, Marin, Ivan N. (2015): A new echiuran-associated snapping shrimp (Crustacea: Decapoda: Alpheidae) from the Indo-West Pacific. Zootaxa 3914 (4): 441-455, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3914.4.4
